Description:
WOW!!! AMAZING BLOCK IN THE HEART OF EMERALD
Opportunitys like this are rare, especially considering the proximity to the main shopping Village of Emerald only a 3-minute drive; the size of land being well over ½ acre and two road frontages including Kilvington Drive and Rawhiti Road. The Character Cottage sits proudly on the land and is complimented by a separate Studio, Carport and Garden Shed. You may be searching for the perfect block to build your dream home or even a first home buyer to enter the market with future development in mind STCA. Whatever your reasoning I encourage those with a curious mind to inspect early as this one wont last long. Call Rebecca Halit today.
Insights: 73 Kilvington Drive, Emerald VIC 3782 was last sold in 2020 and 7 other 2 bedroom house in Emerald have recently been sold.

Description:
Amazing Commercial Opportunity!!!
This is an amazing opportunity to purchase a commercial property in the heart of the thriving hills township of Emerald. The property is zoned Commercial 1 and is the ideal investment with plenty of exposure, foot traffic and parking out the front. The property is currently leased and returns $1610 per calendar month. The building is approximately 66m2 in size and has a toilet and hand basin and has easy access. If you have been looking to get into the commercial market, call today an inspection is a must.

Description:
Reach for the stars on 3.7 acres approx plus studio
High up on Mount Burnett, where people gather to watch the cosmos, is this lovely property with a galaxy of potential. There's only a cluster of neighbours in this quiet hamlet close to the local stellar communities of Cockatoo, Gembrook & Upper Pakenham.
Superbly private, the 3.7 acre approx. property encompasses the clinker brick home, large drive-through shedding and a huge 10.6 x 4.8m studio/cottage.
The main house has an inviting open living area for dining, lounging and cooking, warmed by a central wood-fired heater. The renovated spacious country kitchen with porcelain butler sink and ample cupboard space has a beautiful view of the setting sun across the rolling hills. 3 sliding doors open this room up to the fresh air of this fully fenced bush setting replete with Kangaroos, Echidnas and Wombats.
The new floating wooden floor leads you to the comfortable bedrooms, two with double BIR. The master where you can stretch out and soak up the views has a beautifully compact ensuite. The family bathroom comprises of a claw foot bath and shower and separate WC. This house has ample storage for everything you need and benefits from an enormous outdoor laundry that could easily transform into a home office.
If you go down to the woods today you'll be sure of a big surprise. The cottage awaits - with vaulted ceiling and picturesque veranda currently used for entertaining with fantastic potential; a studio for...yoga, meditation, wellness, art, music (whatever Matters most to you), Airbnb, or granny flat (STCA). Also, on the grounds, you will find ample shedding and two water tanks totalling 60,000L plus a 2 car carport.
Close to Mount Burnett Observatory.
Come and see what the universe has in store for you.
Insights: 179 Matters Road, Mount Burnett VIC 3781 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
*** CANCELLED - OPEN FOR INSPECTION - SATURDAY 29TH FEB - CANCELLED ***
Nestled in the heart of Emerald on the most useable block you could find, this perfectly presented home is a maintained to the highest standard and offers the beauty of hardwood polished floors, new carpets, high ceilings, wide hallway and feature plasterwork. There are two living areas, the lounge at the front of the home provides a quiet place to relax and unwind in front of the open fire and a large family room with walls of windows is a drenched in natural light and allows you to view the rear yard and the stunning gardens that surround. There are four bedrooms zoned to allow privacy and two bathrooms servicing both sections of the home. The granite kitchen is one of many Wow factors with a 900mm Falcon stove that will cater to the needs of the chef, loads of cupboards and bench space and enough room to cook up a storm. An abundance of extras includes split systems, 56,000 water tanks and solid fuel fire. For those requiring storage for vehicles and toys there is a double open garage plus a huge 6 car garage with over height remote doors and access from the rear laneway. This garage will cater to caravan, boat or an abundance of storage. You will love the big, flat yard, dual access, solar power, stunning landscaped gardens, huge veggie path and the location which will allow you to walk to the shops, cafes, school, kindergarten, Emerald Hub and a variety of groups where you can pursue you creative hobbies. Make the move to the heart of our wonderful community today.
Insights: 9 Emerald-Monbulk Road, Emerald VIC 3782 was last sold in 2020 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Emerald have recently been sold.

Description:
Private Sanctuary Close to Emerald!
Set in the highly sought after Sycamore Avenue is this delightful family home. Sitting in an elevated position on this ½ acre block, this home has calming views of the surrounding hills through the tree tops. A garden lined sealed driveway sweeps up to this stylish home painted in modern tones and striking white trimmed full length bay windows.
There is plenty of space for the family with a living/dining room, family room with a cosy WFH and large meals area next to the well equipped kitchen. In the accommodation zone there are four bedrooms, all bathed in natural light and with views to the lush gardens embracing this home. The Master has abundant storage with a wall of robes and a walk through robe area to the ensuite. Climate comfort for the family will be assured with gas ducted heating throughout.
Outside clever use of retaining walls and landscaped gardens makes the most of this tranquil location providing a number of perfect spots around this home to sit back and relax or to enjoy with friends and family. Glass doors connect the family and meals area to an entertaining area outside under the shade of a Golden Elm, while a seating area around a fire pit will be the favourite spot for friends to share stories. Relax with your favourite drink in the front paved entertaining area and just take in the tranquillity of this quiet location.
The home has a triple carport and is securely fenced to allow children and pets to play safely.
Privately located, yet conveniently close to Emerald, this well presented home is a must see!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
BEAUTIFULLY PRESENTED AND WAITING FOR YOU
Nestled in a quiet leafy location and only minutes drive to the heart of the Emerald or Cockatoo townships, transport, cafes, schools & sporting facilities is this beautiful brick home that offers a fantastic opportunity to finally enjoy the peaceful hills lifestyle you deserve! The perfectly presented home boasts 3 bedrooms all with BIRs, a stylish family bathroom featuring a modern renovation including frameless shower, a spacious, light filled living zone, gas ducted heating, new flooring and a neutral colour palette throughout ensuring that you will love coming home to relax every day! The kitchen is at the heart of the home and provides hotplates, wall oven and dishwasher and large windows that overlook the covered outdoor entertaining area that comes complete with café blinds and fan ensuring year-round entertaining is made easy. The rear yard has been terraced and boasts lush lawn areas for the kids or furry friends to play and a rustic fire pit space ideal to sit back and relax with friends or family on a calm country night. There is a shed currently set up as man cave plus a further garden shed along with double carport and open space for additional parking. Only a short walk from Wright State forest and the many trails to Emerald Lake or Gembrook, this meticulously maintained property is sure to delight, so call today as an inspection is a must!
Insights: 29 Wright Road, Avonsleigh VIC 3782 was last sold in 2020 and 7 other 3 bedroom house in Avonsleigh have recently been sold.

Description:
Stunning 5.5 Acre Block !!
***ATTENTION - THE SMALLER BLOCK IS SOLD - THIS IS YOUR LAST CHANCE TO SECURE A STUNNING PARCEL OF LAND IN THE PERFECT LOCATION***
**AGENT ON SITE SATURDAY 10.30-11AM**
There is power, gas and phone available to the block and WATER is already passing through or maybe you would like to take the opportunity to access the technology of today and live off grid, never having to pay bills again ?
This flat, private and peaceful 5.5 acre block of vacant land is perfectly located on the CBD side of Emerald, allowing easy access to work, family and friends whilst being able to live the life amongst nature.
With only 2 distant neighbours and abutting crown land this is the perfect, private spot to relax and breath the fresh air whilst watching the kangaroos graze and listening to the abundant bird life singing in the tree tops.
The block is in essence flat with a gentle slope and has many beautiful, clear spots where you could build the dream (STCA).
With sealed road access, this acreage is conveniently close:
* 4 minutes to Emerald Township
* 13 minutes to Berwick
* 16 minutes to Rowville
* 50 minutes to Melbourne CBD
The ultimate lifestyle amongst nature - what more could you want!
If you want to secure this opportunity at a great price move quickly as the owner is moving towards securing permits on the block, after which the price will change dramatically!
CALL Samantha Scott on 0438 680 032 TODAY TO DISCUSS THE POTENTIAL OF THE PROPERTY AND ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION !

Description:
Enjoy, Retire, Invest or Develop!
Dont miss this opportunity to purchase this immaculate 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home situated on a flat 1007sqm block, literally a stones throw to Emerald Village.
This cedar clad home hidden behind a luscious hedge has been painted in attractive, cottage colours and features renovated bathrooms, 3 spacious, robed bedrooms with ceiling fans, the Master with ensuite and the other 2 bedrooms zoned at the front of the home. The home has raked ceilings and welcomes an abundance of natural light and garden views through big floor to ceiling windows throughout. Add to this an open plan and spacious kitchen, living, dining area with mains gas heating and split system heating and cooling for comfort all year round.
Outside there is a large double carport with workshop at the rear, a sunny flat, fully fenced yard perfect for the kids, fur babies, parking the van and boat or potentially subdivision (STCA) and full length verandahs front and rear where you can relax with your morning cuppa thats if you havent chosen to take the 5 minute walk into one of Emeralds cafes for breaky.
Whether its the perfect location for you and the family, or maybe you are downsizing or looking for a property with development potential (STCA) this one has all of the above!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
Truly Unique
3.7 Acres of bush land backing on to Gilwell Park, scattered with historic Gembrook pottery and beautiful mud-brick creations this property is something special
Old mud-brick cottages from the 70s with walls of bottles and carvings into the big old wooden structure of the home which was once filled with warmth and a million dreams for the property. Mudbricks crafted by hand, each internal bricks collected for its unique coloring, grand old exposed beams and huge cedar windows letting the light flood in a floor plan of its own design and still with so much for you to as the new owner to change to suit your own style.
A huge shed with power, large wood shed, veggie gardens & fruit trees, mains water, small dam, circular drive way and an abundance of native plants and wildlife
Located just on the edge of town on a quiet road letting where you can enjoy the sounds of countless birds in the trees and the local wild life getting about their daily tracks.
Its just a short drive to the heart of Gembrook offering a number of restaurants, the iconic puffing billy railway station as well as the primary school, kinder and child care centre.
This property is in need of some TLC but has so much to offer. Please give us a call for more information or to book a private inspection
Insights: 84 Warwick Road, Gembrook VIC 3783 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
WORK FROM HOME OPTIONS OR SEPARATE TEENAGERS RETREAT!
With character that only the Hills can provide, this gorgeous two storey home contains the perfect floorplan for a variety of living options. Set on just under ¼ of an acre, the property is positioned in a quiet court location just a short distance to Emeralds main shopping village, public transport, local schools and sporting facilities. With 4 spacious bedrooms (main with full ensuite and walk in robe) plus a large study / home office (or 5th bedroom with ensuite), this home is big enough for any growing family or those looking for extended family living arrangements or even work from home options. There are 3 living zones, two of which flow easily from the kitchen/dining area and directly onto outdoor balconies that take in the view over distant hills and landscaped yard. Tastefully updated, this home is ready to move into and enjoy and comes complete with gas ducted heating throughout plus charming wood heater for those colder days. Outside offers plenty of parking plus a low maintenance block. The sealed driveway leads to a double carport and there is also an extra parking bay for visitors, trailers and the like. Under house storage is ideal for the tradie and a garden shed has also been added for extra storage options!
An inspection of this home is a must!
Contact us for inspection details.

WOW 2 Road Access, Half Acre + Character Home!
If you are looking for great value and not afraid of a little hard work look no further.
This original, character, 2 storey cottage features 2 bedrooms, one with a walk in robe and ensuite upstairs and a 2nd toilet downstairs along with the timber kitchen, meals area and sunken lounge with toasty wood heater.
Situated on a half-acre, there is access from both Williamson Road and Pakenham Rd, giving you easy access to the large barn with mezzanine.
All fully fenced with mains water, power and internet available the potential is huge!

Description:
CENTRAL EMERALD ON OVER 1000M2
Situated in central Emerald and only seconds away from the main street, this much loved property offers the charm of a weatherboard cottage and a white picket fence symbolising the peaceful living of the good old days.
The home boasts 3 spacious bedrooms (2 with built in robes) and are serviced by the family bathroom that has been tastefully updated and provides an additional separate toilet. The oversize kitchen is at the heart of the home and offers and abundance of cupboard space, dishwasher and gas cooking while overlooking the lounge. Special features include gas ducted heating, split system heating and cooling, bamboo flooring and a neutral colour palette throughout.
In addition, there is a bungalow/studio detached from the main home that would be perfect for a teenage child, separate rumpus/playroom or work from home situation with its own full bathroom.
Outside you will find a covered entertaining area while the rear of the property also has a large decked area perfect for a BBQ and to sit back and relax with company on one of the many beautiful days the hills has to offer.
With a double lock up garage, paved driveway, sealed road access and within walking distance of our kindergarten, Primary School, child care, public transport and renowned cafes, this is a home that is sure to impress and wont last long, so call today to secure your inspection!

Description:
Character & Charm on the City Side of Emerald!
Privately nestled behind a canopy of trees and solid front fence is this absolutely charming and character filled home. Electric entry gates open to a spacious front yard with stylish retaining walls, landscaped gardens, single carport and an area ideal for parking the caravan, trailer or additional vehicle.
The home has wonderful old style charm with a contemporary twist. Polished floorboards, high ceilings, double hung windows and ornate ceiling roses are complimented by neutral modern tones throughout and energy efficient hydronic heating which keeps the home cosy and warm in the cooler months. This home features three bedrooms, two light filled living zones and a second toilet for added convenience. The retro styled kitchen overlooks the first living zone and enjoys views over the large back yard.
With glass doors opening out from both living areas to a north facing sun drenched rear deck, you have the option of creating a wonderful entertaining indoor/outdoor area for friends and family or the perfect spot to relax and take in the peaceful tranquillity of this very private yard.
The rear yard is landscaped to showcase the many flowering native bushes which attracts local birdlife and large enough for kids and pets to play safely all day. The privacy at this home makes you feel like youre the only one enjoying the pure magic of your surrounds.
Situated close to the Emerald township and with easy access via Wellington road to the city, Berwick or Rowville - this is certainly a wonderful home which wont disappoint!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
PREPARE FOR YOUR WORLD TO BE ROCKED!!! RENOVATED FAMILY HOME & HUGE GARAGE!!!
***OPEN CANCELLED - CONTACT AGENT***
Boasting five bedrooms, this recently renovated cedar home is simply the best on the market for those seeking a family home which ticks all the boxes. With a contemporary and inviting exterior, the size of this home and its parcel of land is sure to impress.
Set amongst a beautiful part of Emerald, this property sits on just under ¾ of an acre and is fully fenced, with privacy from the street and neighbours with established hedges. A light and bright interior will draw you through this warm home and onto the glorious elevated deck overlooking your kingdom.
Featuring five tastefully decorated bedrooms, the master with WTB and newly renovated ensuite, two decks, large living and dining areas with ample storage, two and a half bathrooms, massive garage and landscaped gardens, this classically styled home will leave you wanting nothing more.
Additionally, with private side deck access to the master bedroom, the opportunity exists to convert this into a home business or set up your own Airbnb (STCA). A perfect little side hustle to get a bit of extra income.
With multiple internal and external living zones, the family will really be able to claim their own space, entertain or just chill out. The front of the property features a relaxing lounge room with a newly installed toasty fireplace and at the back of the home you will find a huge living area that leads onto the full length deck, with enough room for all the extended family and friends to join you for a summer BBQ.
The kitchen is the heart of the home and this brand-new kitchen does not disappoint. Featuring classic white cabinetry, stone benchtops, modern black hardware, Bosch dishwasher, induction cooktop, pyrolytic wall oven, built in microwave and a walk-in pantry. Whether you are an avid entertainer or want a spot for the kids to spread out and do their schoolwork, the huge island bench which comfortably seats 6, is just the thing you need. With two meals areas adjoining this space, this IS the kitchen of your dreams.
Tradespeople and home hobbyists are really going to be WOWED by the huge 6 car garage with spilt systems and separate internal workshop. You could even convert this downstairs area into a separate granny flat for visiting guests or colossal rumpus room (STCA).
Additionally, the property features a 3.3M high carport to fit the van/boat/work truck, vegie boxes, fruit trees, aviary, chook shed, wood stores and more shedding. With an abundance of off-street parking, this property creates opportunities for you to work and garden to your hearts content. Taking into account, you can choose to run the home entirely from tank water, you will be doing your bit for the planet.
This property fits all the criteria a growing family needs with its access to both junior and senior schools, bus connections, sporting facilities, library, community hub, cafes and restaurants, and all the amenities and activities Emerald has to offer.
Houses this size in Emerald do not come along very often so this is an opportunity not to be missed!
Give Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 or Amy Fairway 0409 336 420 a call now to arrange a suitable time to explore this magnificent home.
consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Immaculate Home On Large Block!
Immaculately presented family home on a flat 0.6 acre allotment that will impress!
Automatic entry gates open to a circular drive, outstanding landscaped gardens and a spacious sun drenched front yard. A tiled entry foyer leads to the large living room and dining area complete with a wood fire heater to provide a cosy ambiance in the cooler months. Gas ducted heating and split system will ensure climate comfort all year round.
Integrated into this living zone is the well-appointed kitchen featuring spacious bench space, dishwasher and a large walk in pantry that will excite the chefs in the family.
Glass doors in the living zone open out to two outdoor entertaining areas providing the perfect space to enjoy with family and friends. The front verandah, pergola and timber deck overlooks the large front yard making it the ideal place to enjoy a meal with friends. The rear timber deck is a more private zone where you can soak up the morning sun and quietly enjoy a morning cuppa.
This home features three robed bedrooms, the large master with an ensuite.
The impressive features continue outside with a large double garage, double carport, garden sheds, 3kw solar power, powered self-contained room ideal as a gym room, home office, art studio, raised veggie beds, berry patch and a selection of fine fruit/nut trees such as lemon, plum, apples, macadamias and avocado.
The park like gardens and expansive lawn in the front yard is the perfect place to meander and soak up the tranquillity, or perhaps to enjoy a game of summer cricket with family.
Walking distance to the Avonsleigh store, Bam Bam restaurant, Emerald secondary school, public transport, sports oval and Emerald township, this stunning property will not last long.
Bethany Day 0438 844 968

Description:
Immaculate and Palatial Entertainer
This striking home will give you a lifetime of joy. Every single detail of this house has been built to the highest standard and from the highest quality materials. From the exquisite jarrah-edged cypress pine flooring and coffered ceilings to the full height tiling in all 3 bathrooms and the 360-degree wrap-around veranda.
On 1 dual access acre (approx.), overlooking the beauty of Wright Forest, this exceptional 5 bedroom home offers all the room your family could ever require. The upper level features a magnificent kitchen/living space with French doors out to the alfresco dining deck. The kitchen is a sensation centred around a kitchen island with stone benchtops and blackwood kitchen cupboards. The large butlers' pantry will hide everything away from your guests as you enjoy celebrating life.
Upstairs, a "hygge" winter sitting room with wood fire heater leads to the luxurious master suite; a calming space with a vast walk-in wardrobe, plus magnificent ensuite with shower and freestanding bath positioned to enjoy the outdoors. At the far end of this level, you will also find a large study, 2 beautiful queen bedrooms, and a large family bathroom.
The lower level is exceptionally well-equipped and could easily provide dual occupancy with the handsome bar doubling as a fully functional kitchen. Although this cool spacious summer living area is in its element hosting everything from movie nights to Christmas lunch. Again French doors open to a second and even larger deck with stair access to the upper alfresco area.
Other features include a fire pit, ducted heating, split system, gas heating, terraced parking for a multitude, bountiful storage and there is potential to create a substantial workshop under the house.
To celebrate the milestones of life in this elegant home call Katie on 0428 744 498
Internal area
343m²

Description:
Amazing Location, Impressive Home!
Only 2 years young, this very spacious modern architecturally designed 3 bedroom + study home offers luxury comforts throughout and is perfectly situated on a comfortable half acre block, just a short stroll into the Gembrook township.
A formal perennial garden including feature trees such as Copper Beech, Lollipop Silver Birch, Forest Pansy Rosebuds and Ornamental Pears provide a wonderful welcome upon arrival to this home. From the moment you step through the feature wooden entry door you will be impressed with the luxe finishes including 11 foot ceilings and stunning imported Italian porcelain tiles that lead you to the impressive kitchen and open plan family room, the main hub of this stunning home.
No expense was spared on this well designed quality kitchen which features 40mm caesarstone benchtops, 900mm wide induction cooktop, two Electrolux ovens, Clark double undermount sink, Franke kitchen taps, soft close drawers and a 2.4m glazed door to the private courtyard and impressive scullery. The large island bench connects the kitchen with the living area and will be a popular place where friends and family will gather and share stories and laughter.
The gas fire in the living area will create a cosy ambience in the cooler months while the 2.4m high bi-parting double glazed glass doors open this living area onto a north facing entertaining deck to create a wonderful indoor/outdoor entertaining area. Enjoy this space with family and friends looking out over the front landscaped gardens to the Gembrook ranges and beyond. The young, and young at heart, will delight watching the iconic Puffing Billy pass by.
This home includes a purpose built theatre room complete with wall to wall curtains, remote controlled projector screen and 11 inbuilt speakers for the best cinema experience. Also included is a large study featuring a wall to wall desk, bespoke cabinetry and modern plantation shutters which opens up this study into the family room.
Featuring three robed bedrooms including a sizable master bedroom with a walk in robe, ensuite and bi-parting glass doors that open out to a private courtyard garden filled with clivias, lilies, hellebores, bluebells and more.
The exquisite quality continues with double glazed windows, contemporary pendant light fittings, data/tv points to all living rooms, study and bedrooms, ducted vacuum system, zoned and ducted reverse cycle airconditioner/heater, plush pure wool carpet to bedrooms and theatre room, fitted blockout blinds and curtains, powder room, abundant storage throughout this home and security system.
The 6m x 6m garage plus additional workspace or storage area includes TV/Data points and is positioned at the rear of the home with an adjacent 10,000L rainwater tank, a shed and animal enclosures.
Luxury of space continues outside with a large rear paddock, plenty of room for kids and pets to run and play amongst the maples, elms and nut trees.
Only on inspection will you truly appreciate what this impressive family built home has to offer!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Richard Birtchnell 0438 747 357

Description:
VICTORIA ROSE PERFECTION ON OVER 3400m2
***ACCESS VIA EMERALD LAKE ROAD***
Perfectly positioned, on a sealed road, in Emeralds most highly sought after area is this much loved, one owner, double storey family home that has been designed to ensure the ultimate in family living.
From the moment you enter the home you will be impressed by the quality, size and style that is on offer including ceiling rose, ornate cornices, decorative skirting and dado paneling. Downstairs features a large study or 6th bedroom, stunning formal lounge with integrated speakers, spacious master bedroom complemented by a stylish full ensuite with double vanity and walk in robe. The stunning country style kitchen overlooks the family and meals area and features timber benchtops, an abundance of cupboard space, Asko dishwasher and 7 burner Belling oven that would cater for the largest of family gatherings and is sure to impress the chef in the family. Every window offers a stunning garden view and allows the outside to frame the home with beauty.
Upstairs boasts the third spacious living area that would be ideal as a kids play room or teenage retreat. French door lead out onto the balcony with views over the picturesque gardens and out to Nobelius Park and Emerald Lake Park. The remaining 4 bedrooms (3 with walk-in robes) all have stunning views and are serviced by a large family bathroom with separate toilet.
Special features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum and picture windows.
Outside you will feel as though you are in a botanical oasis with landscaped established gardens and lush lawn areas perfect for the kids to play and your four legged friends to romp around. The enormous gazebo provides the perfect space for year round entertaining and has seen many a summer BBQ and Christmas lunch. There is an abundance of extras including: raised veggie patch, chook pen, two 8000L water tanks, all services connected, garden shed, sealed drive and double garage..
This spectacular property is located within walking distance of our iconic Puffing Billy, shops, kindergarten, Primary School, tennis club and walking trails and is offered for sale for the first time, to secure a landmark property, call today to arrange your inspection.

Description:
CENTRAL EMERALD AND PRIVATE
If you have been looking for a home that offers the best of Hills living with the convenience of having everything at your fingertips, this is the home for you.
Walk to Puffing Billy station and take in the delights of our iconic steam train, enjoy a latte at one of the many eateries, wander around the shops or along the walking trail that leads to Emerald Lake Park and beyond; all just a short stroll from this fabulously located property.
This place will suit a family or astute investor as it carries the potential for development.
Situated on a flat, fully fenced, quiet and private block of 1011m2 (approx) with established gardens, this much loved property requires some repairs and TLC to restore it to tip top condition and make a wonderful home.
Large windows and sliding doors offer easy access out to the gardens and bathe the house in natural light. The rear yard is enclosed and provides a safe place for children to play and features the iconic Hills Hoist.
A brick single car garage sits at the end of the concrete driveway and incorporates two rooms ideally suited for storage and a workshop.
The home is large and designed with separate living zones. It features:
3 large bedrooms, master with full ensuite
built-in robes in all bedrooms
family bathroom and separate powder room
large lounge room with high ceiling and atmospheric gas log fire

Description:
VACANT LAND.10 Glorious acres (approx.) IN MACCLESFIELD.
A unique opportunity to purchase a magnificent 10 acres (approx.) in an environment that can only be described as beautiful, tranquil and private. Situated in a prime Macclesfield location, this fully fenced and pastured property is widely sought after and seldom found! For the horse enthusiasts, there is an established fully fenced and sand based ménage, magnificent shade trees, picturesque surrounds and permanent wetlands at the rear of the property supporting an abundance of bird and wildlife. A rare opportunity to build your own dream home on a magnificent property with local riding trails, and the Macclesfield pony/adult riding club in close proximity.
